name: Stein der Weisen
overview: A scientist has been captured by a villainous tyrant who is now trying to force him to make gold for him. The main hero of the adventure, i.e. the player, actually stumbles into this story by accident. But as it should be for an adventurer and hero, this challenge is of course accepted. Will it be possible to obtain the Philosopher's Stone, that mystical elixir that can turn everything into gold? And if so, what will happen then?
